item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

Biography Kausik Das, better known as Kd to his pals, was born in March 10, 1992 but due to some weird reasons he doesn’t celebrate his birthday on this very day. After fooling around his family, schools, college, institute, job and finally last but not the least with himself he is now a Project Assistant of IISER Tirupati. He is a computer, technology and sound enthusiast . He really endorse GNU/Linux operating system and admire â€˜Free Software Foundation â€™.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I was a teaching assistant for the following courses at IISER Tirupati: IDC121: Introduction to Computation
